title: Game Glitched
body: I was in a game but i disconnected and it crashed so i restarted my client, when i return to the game it says reconnect but every time i try it doesnt work giving me the error message saying "unable to connect to server". Ive turned my internet on and off a few times, restarted my client and restarted my laptop but it keeps asking me to rejoin the game when i log back in even though the game was a few hours ago and is finished by now. Anyone know anything else i could try to fix the problem ?

replies.body: It looks some like players are experiencing ghost games per a response on the[ EUW H&S](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/jg1u6stz-cant-reconnect-to-the-game?comment=000f).  This can occur if the end of the match can't communicate to our servers that it's finished.  Usually relogging can force that update, otherwise you may need to wait a bit for that communication to go through.  Hang tight!
yeah ive relogged a couple of times so ill wait it out and check back tomorrow on it, thanks for the help
